io.vertx.ext.consul

Class TxnError

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.ext.consul.TxnError

  • public class TxnError
extends Object
    Holds information describing which operations failed if the transaction was rolled back.
    Author:
    Ruslan Sennov
